Echelon Energy: Echelon Energy is a revolutionary new form of energy that harnesses the power of gravitational waves. By manipulating the curvature of spacetime, Echelon Energy can generate an infinite supply of clean, sustainable power. The energy is collected through specialized gravitational wave antennae, which convert the distortions in spacetime into usable electricity. This innovative energy source has the potential to replace traditional fossil fuels and significantly reduce humanity's carbon footprint.

Quantum Flux Energy: Quantum Flux Energy is a futuristic form of energy that taps into the quantum realm. By manipulating the quantum field, this energy source can generate an infinite supply of power that is both clean and sustainable. Quantum Flux Energy is collected through specialized quantum sensors, which detect the fluctuations in the quantum field and convert them into usable electricity. This revolutionary energy source has the potential to transform the way we power our world.

Solar Fusion Energy: Solar Fusion Energy is a groundbreaking form of energy that harnesses the power of nuclear fusion. By replicating the processes that occur in the core of the sun, this energy source can generate an infinite supply of clean, sustainable power. Solar Fusion Energy is collected through specialized fusion reactors, which use advanced magnetic confinement technology to contain and harness the energy released by nuclear fusion reactions. This innovative energy source has the potential to replace traditional nuclear power plants and significantly reduce humanity's reliance on fossil fuels.

Gravity Wave Energy is collected through specialized gravitational wave antennae, which convert the distortions in spacetime into usable electricity.
